name: Safari-like thin statusbar for Firefox 3 iFox
description:
This style snippet transforms your statusbar similar than safari's. Also auto-hides icons (only show on hover).
Works with 3.0.4 stable. May need i think the best Safari-skin for Firefox3 (iFox Metal: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/3137). No nightly support yet.

discussions.name: Very nice. Works fine in 3.1b2pre nightlies as of
